description.p: Returns the cotangent of an angle expressed in radians.
A numeric field or value. If *[sql:Radians]* is zero, your query may return NULL or fail with an error.
Returns the cotangent of an angle expressed in radians.

discussion.p: The Cot function computes the cotangent of an angle expressed in radians. Depending on your database, ifi *[sql:Radians]* is zero, the query will either produce an error or return a NULL value.

example.caption: Cot() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 cot(3) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = -7.01525255143453
